article_title: Powerful Medical Receives FDA Breakthrough Device Designation for PMcardio STEMI AI ECG Model
summary: Powerful Medical's PMcardio STEMI AI ECG model has received FDA Breakthrough Device Designation for detecting ST-elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI) and life-threatening cardiac conditions. The designation recognizes the technology's ability to provide accurate and immediate STEMI detection, improving patient outcomes. The company aims to revolutionize emergency cardiac care by bringing this innovation to the US healthcare market. This recognition accelerates the device's path to market authorization and supports its mission to enhance care quality and save lives through earlier and more accurate diagnosis.
